page.shortlink: api client api a5 edit setselection method

argument.name: element
argument.description: The INPUT or TEXTAREA element to set the current selection of.

argument.name: end
argument.description: The end of the selection. If no value for end is passed in then the selection will be zero length.

page.description: Set the current selection in an edit control (INPUT or TEXTAREA).
page.example: // assume that "ele" is a DOM element pointer to an INPUT control, and that the last five characters of a twenty character value are to be selected. var sel = A5.edit.setSelection(ele,14,19);
